attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change the law to ensure that when a Bank makes a mistake that results in costs to it's customer the customer can charge the bank a penalty fee of £50 over and above recouping the actual costs of the mistake.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
